description.description: Description of where or what the light applies to.

worldX.description: The non-instanced world X coordinate to spawn the light on. Used in combination with worldY and plane.

worldY.description: The non-instanced world Y coordinate to spawn the light on. Used in combination with worldX and plane.

plane.description: The world Z coordinate, or plane to spawn the light on. Used in combination with worldX and worldY.

alignment.description: Where to place the light in relation to what it's attached to, be it an NPC, object or world location.

offset.description: The light's position relative to the center of the model it's attached to, before rotation. Only applies if alignment is set to CUSTOM, which is the default.

height.description: The height in scene units (128 per tile) to place the light above the current tile or entity base height.

radius.description: How far the light should reach in all directions. Defaults to 300.

color.description: Light color in sRGB, specified as a hex color code or an array in the range 0-255, which accepts decimals.

type.description: Specify the animation to apply to the light. Defaults to STATIC.

duration.description: The time to complete one cycle of the light type's animation. Currently only affects PULSE lights.

range.description: The distance range to vary the light's radius by according to the light's animation.

fadeInDuration.description: The time in milliseconds until the light is fully active after spawning. May overlap with fade-out if overlap is enabled.

fadeOutDuration.description: The time in milliseconds until the light is fully inactive after despawning. May overlap with fade-in if overlap is enabled.

fadeOverlap.description: If enabled, fade-in and fade-out can overlap if spaced close enough together.

spawnDelay.description: The time in milliseconds between the light spawning and the light beginning to fade in.

despawnDelay.description: The time in milliseconds between the light despawning and the light beginning to fade out.

fixedDespawnTime.description: If enabled, the light will have faded out completely after spawnDelay + despawnDelay milliseconds.

visibleFromOtherPlanes.description: Whether the light should be hidden when it appears on a different plane than the current. Defaults to true.

areas.description: An array of bounding boxes, region IDs and/or area enums specifying which areas the light should be limited to.

npcIds.description: A set of NPC IDs or NpcID keys to apply the light to.

objectIds.description: A set of object IDs or ObjectID keys to apply the light to.

projectileIds.description: A set of projectile IDs to apply the light to.

graphicsObjectIds.description: A set of graphics object IDs to apply the light to.

animationIds.description: A set of animation IDs to display the light for. Must be specified alongside another kind of ID to apply to.
